name: py-easybuild-easyconfigs
description:
Collection of easyconfig files for EasyBuild, a software build and
installation framework for (scientific) software on HPC systems.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-easybuild-framework
dependencies.description:
The core of EasyBuild, a software build and installation framework for
(scientific) software on HPC systems.

dependencies.name: py-easybuild-easyblocks
dependencies.description:
Collection of easyblocks for EasyBuild, a software build and
installation framework for (scientific) software on HPC systems.

dependent_to.name: easybuild

EasyBuild is a software build and installation framework for
